blogPost.excerpt: A lot of apps include a system “Share” menu, but the default share services are usually not very useful. Shareful provides some useful share services like Copy, Open In, Save As, and Save to Downloads.
blogPost.body: A lot of apps include a system “Share” menu, but the default share services are usually not very useful. Shareful provides some useful share services like Copy, Open In, Save As, and Save to Downloads.
blogPost.title: Shareful - Supercharge the macOS share menu
blogPost.author: Sindre Sorhus

localize.description: 很多应用都包含了系统的 "共享 "菜单，但默认的共享服务通常都不是很有用。Shareful提供了一些有用的共享服务，比如复制、打开在、另存为和保存到下载。
很多應用都包含了系統的 "共享 "菜單，但默認的共享服務通常都不是很有用。Shareful提供了一些有用的共享服務，比如複製、打開在、另存爲和保存到下載。

next.excerpt: Startup benchmark data is fragmented and disorganized, scattered across hundreds of Medium blogs. We are curating the world’s largest library of startup benchmark data, creating market transparency for founders and institutions.

localize.description: 创业公司的基准数据是零散的、无序的，分散在数百个Medium博客中。我们正在策划全球最大的创业公司基准数据库，为创始人和机构创造市场透明度。
localize.tagline: 全球最大的创业标杆数据库。

localize.description: 創業公司的基準數據是零散的、無序的，分散在數百個Medium博客中。我們正在策劃全球最大的創業公司基準數據庫，爲創始人和機構創造市場透明度。
localize.tagline: 全球最大的創業標杆數據庫。
